lines.text: What about it? You think they did some kind of magic ritual to kill him?
That's pretty much what I figured. This crime scene doesn't make any sense, and magic doesn't make any sense either.
Dude, no. I'm talking about how the table's all burnt up from the fire!
The same fire that probably cooked our dead buddy, here. Look at him! He's toast!
You think he burned to death?
Well, I don’t know how else it would’ve happened.
There was only one gunshot, and… only one guy bleeding out.
Ah, yes. The… the state of the body is consistent with…
That good enough for now, Leo?
